uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.Platform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VirtualBox, VMwareAbstractHypervisor

    public abstract class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to be implemented by each platform. It must be only instantiated by the platform factory
    Author:
    Clouder
